body.name: Arofa Chrome Handheld Bidet Sprayer for Toilet - Stainless Steel Cloth Diaper Jet Spray, Adjustable Water Pressure Control with Bidet Spray Hoses, Bidet Toilet Sprayer for Baby/Feminine Wash
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 1 hr 49 mins
features: Better Personal Hygiene: The handheld bidet sprayer offers a more hygienic and effective cleaning solution than toilet paper. Ideal for women during pregnancy and menstrual cycles, as well as anyone with limited mobility due to surgery, arthritis, postpartum, or injuries.

Multiple Uses: Our chrome bidet sprayer is not just for personal hygiene, but also works as a cloth diaper sprayer, pet shower, car wash gun, flowers sprayer, baby bathing shower, and more. It's a great cleaning bidet sprayer kit for the whole family.

Two Installation Methods: The bidet for the toilet can be installed directly onto the toilet, saving bathroom space and tools for drilling holes. Alternatively, it can be wall-mounted for other multiple uses according to your requirements.

Water Pressure Control: The jet sprayer for toilet allows you to adjust the water pressure from gentle spray to jet spray, making it versatile for a range of uses. Use the gentle press mode for feminine bottom cleaning, baby bath, or pet washing, and the jet spray for rinsing floors, carpets, or cloth diapers.

Premium Quality Parts: The bidet sprayer set includes a 304 stainless steel bidet nozzle, a stainless steel hose, and a brass T-valve, all of which are rust-proof, anti-corrosion, and easy to maintain. All components are made from top-quality materials to ensure long-lasting.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: ADJUSTABLE WATER PRESSURE JET SPRAY Beyond personal hygiene, it aslo to be an invaluable tool for cleaning the bathroom and shower. The spray shoots at least 6 feet with strong pressure. The powerful water pressure helps you rinse out stubborn stains, such as rinsing floors or cleaning baby diapers. SOFT SPRAY Even with the low water pressure, this bidet performs exceptionally well with a consistent spray that ensures thorough cleaning. You can adjust the water flow to a gentle jet for personal hygiene, plant watering, pet bath cleaning and more.
Widely compatible and easy DIY to save your time and money. Previous page Next page
Start your impressive bidet sprayer experience now! From its effortless installation to its multiple uses and effective performance, every aspect of this product screams quality and convenience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Every home needs a bidet like this!
reviews.reviewText: I don't often write reviews, but this Bidet sprayer has made such a positive impact on my daily hygiene routine that I felt compelled to share my experience. From its effortless installation to its multiple uses and effective performance, every aspect of this product screams quality and convenience.InstallationInstallation was a breeze, and the thoughtful design meant that I didn’t need a professional plumber or an arsenal of tools. I was particularly impressed that a wrench wasn't even necessary, just my hands and some tight screwing. The instructions provided were clear, concise, and easy to follow, making the set-up process swift and painless.Ease of UseEven with the low water pressure in my building, this bidet performs exceptionally well, delivering a consistent and adjustable spray that ensures a thorough clean. I can maneuver it very easily, adjusting the pressure as needed.VersatilityIts versatility cannot be overstated. Beyond personal hygiene, I've found it to be an invaluable tool for cleaning my bathroom and shower. The spray shoots at least 6 feet with strong pressure.QualityThe quality of the materials used in this sprayer is mediocre but still good. The stainless steel is fairly thin, especially in the toilet hanger. The bidet itself feels sturdy.Final ThoughtsOverall, this bidet is a game changer. I cant imagine going back to toilet paper ever again. I'm awarding it a well-deserved 5/5 stars.I have attached a few photos of how I installed the water line and how I hooked it to the toilet tank.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Good, The Bad, and The Ugly…
reviews.reviewText: I’m moderately handy at DIY projects, but I’m 76 years old and plumbing work gets harder at my age. Just about anyone should be able to install this thing. Use plumber’s tape on the fittings. They include a roll of the thinnest tape I’ve ever used… I threw it away and used some I had on hand, which held it’s shape better.The Good…1. The product is made of quality materials and installation is very simple. You’ll likely only need an adjustable wrench to remove and reinstall the water supply line to the shutoff valve coming out of the wall. All the other fittings can and should be tightened by hand. (If it leaks, tighten a bit more until it no longer drips.)2. The device works well and is easy to use! Having never used a bidet I wasn’t sure if I’d like it, so this purchase and install was a test run. It passed and I’m ordering two more for my remaining toilets.3. Several other reviews complained about having to turn a valve on-off each time you use it. I was a bit concerned after reading this, but once installed, I found it to be a simple and easy task. If you’re concerned then try this before ordering: Sitting on the throne, right arm extended, swing your arm straight back about 20 degrees behind you and your hand will touch the bottom of the tank at the water supply line… if you can do that, you can open-close the valve… EasyPeasy!! (If you have a frozen shoulder, or you’re missing your right arm, then the valve will be a hassle.)The Bad… Your water supply line to the tank will likely need to be replaced. I had a stainless steel braided 12” line which was too long for the ~6in required distance. My local hardware store had a 9” replacement in stainless for $9 and rubber for $7… Get the stainless, it will last forever.The Ugly… The picture of the device installed shows the spray handle hanging vertically when not used… The mount that I received doesn’t hold the handle in that position, the opening isn’t the right size, but it will rest there… I discovered placing the sprayer end into the mount bracket is very secure but less attractive because this places the handle in a horizontal position causing the hose to protrude farther forward. It’s not a big deal, just a bit annoying.We decided the under the lid style wasn’t for us due to aiming issues and cleaning. This simple hose method does the job fine and makes toilet cleaning a much easier task. Buy one now!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great and handy product
reviews.reviewText: It was great with the price. Quality is good and very simple to install and ready to use in just 15 mins . Worked as expected. Great product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a very well made bidet sprayer. It was easy to install (I am 70 years old and arthritic) and just needed a light wrench. The fittings were slightly bigger than those on my not standard toilet- by no means a product defect- so I could not create a water tight seal without, I suppose, adapters. Because of this I took off a star because I could not test the unit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install, easy to use.
reviews.reviewText: I wasn't sure how well this would work considering I'm a girl with plenty of hips! But it's really easy to use. I have a rental and I wouldn't say the install was 'quick' because toilets are always in a corner that make it hard to get to all the stuff you need to access, but it was easy and it didn't require me doing anything to the bathroom that could cause an issue. Removing it when I move will be easy as well. It's not your fancy automatic bidet with warm water, but it does what it needs to without making a mess in the process. I got used to the cold water lol. And for the ladies out there who have to deal with menstrual periods, there have been moments when I really appreciated what this sprayer could do! In fact, because of that, even if I end up with one of those fancy automatic bidets, I would want to keep this on the side. It's also very useful if anyone ends up feeling ill, makes the clean up easy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install and works great
reviews.reviewText: Installation was easy and straightforward. Everything went together hand tight and sealed without leaks. I did apply Teflon tape to all threads, but that is out of habit. I found the water flow with the valve all the way open was too much, but it is easy to turn it down.
Instruction was really helpful and clear for installationAlso really useful product.
Super easy to install & great quality!No leakage at all, definitely recommend this product!

reviews.reviewTitle: An Essential Upgrade for Personal Hygiene: Portable, Efficient and Easy-to-Use Bidet Sprayer
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased this bidet sprayer and it has become an absolute game-changer for my personal hygiene routine. The sprayer is not only easy to install but also incredibly efficient and simple to use.Installation was a breeze. The instructions provided were clear and concise, taking the guesswork out of the process. I was particularly impressed with the quality of the materials - it's evident that this product is built to last!The sprayer works exceptionally well. In fact, it's so effective that it has significantly reduced my reliance on toilet paper. The pressure is easy to adjust, allowing me to customize the flow to my comfort level.What I appreciate most about this bidet sprayer is its versatility. Beyond personal hygiene, it has also proven to be a useful tool for cleaning my bathroom. This product has certainly exceeded my expectations in terms of performance and utility.One minor drawback is that the bidet can leak a little bit from the bottom hole once you have finished using it. However, this is easily managed by emptying any remaining water into the toilet or sink.In terms of size, it fits perfectly in my bathroom without taking up too much space. It's compact yet efficient, making it the perfect solution for maintaining cleanliness whether at home or on the go.In conclusion, this bidet sprayer is an excellent investment for anyone looking to improve their personal hygiene routine. It's easy to install, efficient, and offers great value for money. I highly recommend it to anyone in search of a simple and effective solution for maintaining cleanliness in the bathroom.

Perfect for bidet like use or rinsing off washable diapers. Also great to help rinse/clean toilet bowl.Just make sure you turn the valve off after use to avoid leak, says so in insteuctions.Had it for a month, no issues so far, lots of pressure.
